name: Chang Ge 0002
content: Chang Ge Work Experience Teaching Selected Publications Patents Awards & Honors Recent Services Miscellanies Chang Ge Email: cge AT umn.edu Office: 4-213 Keller Hall, 200 Union Street SE, Minneapolis, MN 55455 I am an assistant professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at the University of Minnesota since September 2022. I obtained a PhD in computer science from the University of Waterloo in June 2022. My main research focuses on the area of data systems, with special interest in enabling data analysis on dirty, private, and federated data. Open positions: I have multiple openings for self-motivated students. If you are interested in working with me, please read this.
